notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: ยง J.D.D., S.E.K., and L.C. contributed equally. R.E.A. designed and oversaw the research project. J.D.D. built the structures and performed the MD simulations. R.E.A., J.D.D., S.E.K., L.C., P.U.L., and A.D. performed the simulation analyses. J.D.D, L.C., P.U.L., and A.D. created the figures. R.E.A., J.D.D., S.E.K., L.C., P.U.L., and A.D. wrote the paper.
